meanings.definition: The study of purposes or goals in nature.
meanings.sent1: Scientists explore teleonomies to understand the reasons behind natural phenomena.
meanings.sent2: The concept of teleonomies helps us appreciate the order in the natural world.
meanings.sent3: Learning about teleonomies can be as exciting as solving a mystery in nature.
meanings.sent4: In the intricate web of teleonomies, every living thing plays a unique role.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of teleonomies lies in the harmony of nature's grand plan.

meanings.definition: The existence of purpose or design in nature.
meanings.sent1: Many philosophers debate the presence of teleonomies in the universe.
meanings.sent2: Nature's teleonomies can be seen in the way ecosystems function seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: It's fascinating to ponder the teleonomies behind the patterns of migration in birds.
meanings.sent4: The teleonomies of nature are like a well-written symphony, each element contributing to the whole.
meanings.sent5: The teleonomies of a flower reveal the intricate balance of life's intentions.
